abstract.t: This document specifies an xinclude1() scheme for use in XPointer- based fragment identifiers. This scheme, like other XPointer Framework [12] schemes, is designed primarily for use with the XML Media Types defined in RFC 3023 [5], to identify locations within a given XML representation of a resource. The xinclude() scheme notifies an XPointer processor whether the creator of the XPointer intended for XInclude 1.0 [9] processing to take place.
